name: The Spire
description: Okay, for starters: THIS LEVEL IS LARGE. VERY, VERY, VERY LARGE. It has ~2400 sectors and ~2300 monsters on UV. I would NOT recommend playing this level if you have a really old computer. Second, this map is pretty hard. 100% kills and secrets on skill 4 is possible, but difficult (I've done it with a lot of saving and reloading). Other than that, it's fun with a lot of action. So enjoy it!
